name: DR. REGINALD BOULOS
description: Dr. Boulos is considering running for the Presidency of Haiti as MTV Ayiti member.
sampleDescriptions: Dr. Reginald Boulos is considering running for the Presidency in the country of Haiti in November, 2021.  Dr. Reginald is a respected medical doctor, business person, and creator of the MTV Ayiti poli

Dr. Reginald Boulos started the MTVAyiti political movement to empower more Haitians, especially women, farmers, youth, and the Haitian American diaspora.  Dr. Boulos is an emerging Presidential candi
